meanings.definition: An enzyme that breaks down proteins.
meanings.sent1: The protease in our stomach helps to digest the chicken we ate.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study protease to understand how it affects our body's processes.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke about a protease walking into a protein bar - it was a real enzyme party!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a protease, breaking down any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The protease worked tirelessly, dismantling the protein molecules with precision.

meanings.definition: A substance that aids in the digestion of proteins.
meanings.sent1: The protease supplement helped improve my digestion after meals.
meanings.sent2: Nutritionists recommend foods rich in protease for better protein absorption.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a dash of protease to the marinade for a tender and flavorful steak.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a protease, helping others break down their worries.
meanings.sent5: The protease supplement was like a digestive superhero, ensuring smooth digestion.
